attributes.action: STOP the killing of innocent Whales on the Faroe Islands
attributes.additional_details: Innocent whales have been brutally slayed since the Since the 16th century, There has been whaling around the Faroe Islands since the time of Norse settlements. Specific records date back to as early as 1584. Usually it's the pilot whales that are killed by the captors but any around the area are trapped in low waters near the shore and there spinal chords are destroyed, this is supposed to be an instant kill but some pilot whales cry in agony.
